data.title: Obituary of Gerry Lynne ANDERSON
data.meta_description:
September 18, 1944 – February 15, 2012

Gerry Lynne Anderson beloved wife of Wayne, passed away surrounded by her loving family after a brief illness
data.text: September 18, 1944 – February 15, 2012 Gerry Lynne Anderson beloved wife of Wayne, passed away surrounded by her loving family after a brief illness on Wednesday, February 15, 2012 at the age of 67 years. A third generation Calgarian, Gerry (and Wayne) moved to Nanton, AB after retirement and found a great group of friends. Besides her husband Wayne of forty-eight years, Gerry will be greatly missed by her sons Jeff (Melanie), Blain and her daughter Tracy (Rob). She will be lovingly remembered by her four grandchildren, Railey, Nicole, Kahler and Chase. She is also survived by her sister Janice and brother Colin. A Private Family Gathering will be held at a later date. If friends so desire, memorial tributes may be made directly to the Canadian Diabetes Association, #204, 2323 – 32nd Avenue N.E., Calgary, AB T2E 6Z3 Telephone: (403) 266-0620, ext. 112, www.diabetes.ca or to STARS – Alberta Shock Trauma Air Rescue Foundation – Calgary Base, 1441 Aviation Park N.E. Box 570, Calgary, AB T2E 9Z9. Forward condolences through www.mcinnisandholloway.com. The family would like to thank the staff at the Foothills hospital ICU Unit C for their excellent care of Gerry and kind support of the family during this difficult time. In living memory of Gerry Anderson, a tree will be planted at Fish Creek Provincial Park by McINNIS & HOLLOWAY FUNERAL HOMES, Fish Creek Chapel, 14441 BANNISTER ROAD S.E. Telephone: (403) 256-9575.
